ygData.subject: Re: evil in the light elf realm
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok to get to the boat take the tunnels... Can t remember the way off the top of my head thru the tunnels, but if you follow the right wall in the sandy area
ygData.messageBody:
Ok to get to the boat take the tunnels... Can't remember the way off the top
of my head thru the tunnels, but if you follow the right wall in the sandy
area infront of town you will find a fake wall with the tunnels... If you
follow it you can swim up under the dock...


>From: "Fraal" <mata_eq@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>, <EQ_Shaman@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] evil in the light elf realm
>Date: Thu, 23 Sep 1999 09:20:53 -0400
>
>From: "Fraal" <mata_eq@...>
>
>nice to know once I am too BB, but how can a Troll get to the boat? They
>are KOS in Freeport right?
>What about Ogres?
>
>
> >
> > Heh gonna be a pain, but jump off the boat to the right of the docks and
> > follow the water to it's end... Then just stay up high on the right zone
> > wall and walk along it all the way up it... You have about a 95% chance
>of
> > not getting jumped that way..
> >
> >
> > > >From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
> > >
> > >Myself and my three troll friends are thinking of
> > >making a trip to Unrest. However, none of us have ever
> > >been to that continent as evil players. Could you all
> > >please give some hints on how to get my warrior type
> > >friends safely past bb? Also, is there anyplace there
> > >that we can sell? Or buy food for that matter. :)
> > >
> > >Thank you!
> > >
> > >Darkmoon 16th circle
> > >
